Package it.polimi.ingsw.common

Interface VirtualView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsoleView, GUIView
    public interface VirtualView
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The interface that declares all the method that the view must have.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void broadcast​(java.lang.String value)
      This method sends a broadcast message to every client connected to the server.
      void completeCardInfo​(java.lang.String value)
      This method parses the deserialized JsonObject in order to show to the information of the weapon card asked by the player.
      void completeCreateGame​(java.lang.String value)
      This method notifies that the action "create game" has been completed successfully.
      void completeDisconnect​(java.lang.String value)
      This method completes the action of disconnecting the client who asked to be disconnected from the server.
      void completeEndAction​(java.lang.String value)
      This method notifies the player that the action "end action" has been completed successfully.
      void completeLogin​(java.lang.String value)
      This method completes the login action making it possible to the player to enter the GameListScreen.
      void completePowerUpInfo​(java.lang.String value)
      This method parses the deserialized JsonObject in order to show to the information of the power up asked by the player.
      void completeSelectAction​(java.lang.String value)
      This method notifies the player that the action "select action" has been completed successfully.
      void completeSelectGame​(java.lang.String value)
      This method notifies that the action "select game" has been completed successfully.
      void completeVoteBoard​(java.lang.String value)
      This method notifies the player that the action "vote board" has been completed successfully.
      void endGameScreen​(java.lang.String value)
      This method shows the last screen when the game ends.
      void errorMessage​(java.lang.String value)  
      void gameBroadcast​(java.lang.String value)
      This method sends a broadcast message to every client of a specific game connected to the server.
      void infoMessage​(java.lang.String value)  
      void isConnected​(java.lang.String value)  
      void updateBoard​(java.lang.String value)
      This method updates the board of every player whenever it is called by the server, so that players can see how the match is evolving.
      void updateGameList​(java.lang.String value)
      This method updates the screen that shows to the player how many games have been created and who is currently logged into every game (eve if the client is currently disconnected from the server).
      void updateGameNotStartedScreen​(java.lang.String value)
      This method updates the screen that is shown to the player when he selected the game he wants to be part of and he is waiting for the game to start.
      void updateState​(java.lang.String value)
      This method updates the game state of a specific player, guiding him through the game by showing him only what he can do in the moment of the game in which this method is called.

    • Method Detail

      • broadcast

        void broadcast​(java.lang.String value)
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method sends a broadcast message to every client connected to the server.
        Parameters:
        value - A serialized JsonObject that will be deserialized using JsonUtility.jsonDeserialize(String value) method, containing all the information from the server
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • gameBroadcast
